Name: Verify Industrial Building Automation Overview in Applications
Description: Navigate to the applications page and access the industrial section. View the building automation overview in the selected language. Perform a search and verify the displayed page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://www-int.itg.ti.com/
step 2: Click on link 'Menu'
step 3: Click on link 'Applications'
step 4: Click on link 'Industrial'
step 5: Click on list  -> Navigate to page 'applications/industrial/building-automation/overview.html'
step 6: Click on link 'Language'
step 7: Click on ti
step 8: Click on link 'Search'
step 9: Click on atomic 'headerSearchBox' -> Navigate to page 'sitesearch/en-us/docs/universalsearch.tsp'
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Cart Page after Adding Items
Description: Navigate to the home page and perform a search. Proceed to checkout and verify the displayed cart page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://www-int.itg.ti.com/
step 2: Click on atomic 'headerSearchBox' -> Navigate to page 'sitesearch/en-us/docs/universalsearch.tsp'
step 3: Click on ti
step 4: Click on ti
step 5: Click on ti
step 6: Enter input value in ti
step 7: Click on link 'Checkout' -> Navigate to page 'store/en-us/cart'
step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
